page.title: 10Work in the Area
page.content: There is little work in the area. On osmondthorpe lane there is the Nevillle Hill Depot of British Rail. This is an engineering repair works and cleansing unit. There is also Festival Foods plant at the top of Osmondthorpe Lane. These are the only two industrial employers People have to travel outside the area to Harehills for tailoring or Hunslet for engineering. Closures in the tailoring trade affected the area and many people were made redundant. The Cross Green Industrial Estate to the south west does provide a new source of employment for the area. It is close enough to walk to and from the area to the estate.
